name: XENOTILT: HOSTILE PINBALL ACTION
description:
XENOTILT: HOSTILE PINBALL ACTION



Turbo-Charged Pinball Reloaded!!

FEATURES:


  • AN EXPANSIVE 3 STORY TABLE
  • NIGHTMARISH NEW BOSSES
  • REALTIME LIGHTS, GORGEOUS SPRITEWORK
  • 9 BALL MULTIBALL MATRIX
  • BIG NUMBERS, BULLET HELL
  • CAVERNOUSLY DEEP MECHANICS
  • A MEGA-DRIVEN SOUNDTRACK BY EC2151


Multiball unleashed!!

3 TIER PLAYFIELD
Welcome to the SAMARITAN, A derelict ship turned HOSTILE, has anyone survived?

XENOPHAGE SWARM
A vicious infestation that plagues the SAMARITAN.

THE TURRET SYSTEM
BIG BULLETS chew up baddies & smash enemy volleys.

THE PERK SYSTEM
Upgrade your WEAPONS, DEFENSE & SCORING POWER with 9 UNIQUE PERKS.

THE MULTIBALL MATRIX
Holds 9 Balls, Activates Perks, Unleash MULTIBALL!!

CRISIS MODE
Time Attack w/ A Multiball twist. Level Up, Die n' retry.

HARDCORE MODE
ONE BALL, MAXXED FIREPOWER.

STEAMDECK:


GREAT ON THE GO! Gameplay that rocks the small screen.
Great for short bursts, or that long commute!


This might hurt...

THE XENOPHAGE:


HERA the Rogue Pirate A.I.
A sentient Malware has taken over the SAMARITAN. COSMIC PIRATE QUEEN.

CHRYSALIS
A bruiser of a XENOPHAGE bug, swarm protector.

T.I.G.E.R. SUPREME
Offensive security measures for the SAMARITAN.

STAR PILOT
Addicted to LIFE SUPPORT he functions now as the UNDEAD NAVIGATOR.

MECHA-NEKO
Weaponized Blackjack Dealer. Press your luck for big points!

OLMECH
STONE GOD grafted with cybernetic enhancements.

BROOD MOTHER
HIVE MOTHER to the XENOPHAGE SWARM. Don't touch her babies!!

AUDIO / VISUAL

"Hi-Bit", massive colorful sprites inspired by the Neo-Geo, Saturn and PlayStation era. Scaling, rotation, camera zooms... No "blast processor" required! A Mega-Driven Soundtrack: An all-NEW OST true to the guttural sound of the Sega Genesis, composed by E.C.2151
